alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 10:40PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Eastland and Stephens Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1039 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorm from near Albany to Moran to Silver Valley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Breckenridge, Eastland, Cisco, Ranger, Gorman, Rising Star, Hubbard Creek Reservoir, Lake Cisco, Lake Daniel, Lake Leon, Gunsight, Necessity, Lake Olden, Caddo, Crystal Falls, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Pleasant Hill, Carbon, Staff and Nimrod. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 324 and 355. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and north central Texas.
